description:
Alternative fueling stations are located throughout the United States and Canada, and their availability continues to grow. The Alternative Fuels Data Center (AFDC) maintains a website where you can find alternative fueling stations near you or on a route, obtain counts of alternative fueling stations by state, view maps, and more.

The most recent dataset available for download here provides a "snapshot" of the alternative fueling station information for compressed natural gas (CNG), ethanol (E85), propane/liquefied petroleum gas (LPG), biodiesel (B20 and above), electric vehicle charging, hydrogen, and liquefied natural gas (LNG), as of July 29, 2021.

distribution.description: A "snapshot" of the alternative fueling station information for compressed natural gas (CNG), E85 (85% ethanol, 15% gasoline), propane/liquefied petroleum gas (LPG), biodiesel, electricity, hydrogen, and liquefied natural gas (LNG), as of April 23, 2015.
distribution.title: Alternative Fuel Stations 2014.csv

distribution.description: A "snapshot" of the alternative fueling station information for compressed natural gas (CNG), E85 (85% ethanol, 15% gasoline), propane/liquefied petroleum gas (LPG), biodiesel, electricity, hydrogen, and liquefied natural gas (LNG), as of April 4, 2012.
distribution.title: Alternative Fuel Stations 2012.csv

distribution.description: Access up-to-date fuel station data here. Filling out the form will allow for the download of the most recent alternative fuel station data.
distribution.title: Alternative Fuel Station Data Download

distribution.description:
There are five ways to find stations. All Stations: Return a full list of alternative fuel stations that match your query. Get Station by ID: Fetch the details of a specific alternative fuel station given the station's ID. Last Updated Date: Retrieve the date when the alternative fuel stations data were last updated. Nearest Stations: Return the nearest alternative fuel stations within a distance of a given location. Stations Nearby Route: Find alternative fuel stations within a distance of a driving route.

Last Updated Date: Retrieve the date when the alternative fuel stations data were last updated.

Nearest Stations: Return the nearest alternative fuel stations within a distance of a given location.

Stations Nearby Route: Find alternative fuel stations within a distance of a driving route.
distribution.title: Alternative Fuel Stations API

distribution.description: An interactive map that shows the locations of alternative fueling stations in the United States and Canada. This map is designed to find alternative fuel stations in a specified area.
distribution.title: Alternative Fuel Stations Nearest Locator Map

distribution.description: An interactive map that shows the locations of alternative fueling stations in the United States and Canada. This map is designed to find alternative fuel stations along a defined route.
distribution.title: Alternative Fuel Stations Route Locator Map

distribution.description: Provides a list of states that shows the number of alternative fuel stations that can be found in each state. The count is categorized by the type of alternative fuel station.
distribution.title: Alternative Fuel Station Count By State

distribution.description: A "snapshot" of the alternative fueling station information for compressed natural gas (CNG), E85 (85% ethanol, 15% gasoline), propane/liquefied petroleum gas (LPG), biodiesel, electricity, hydrogen, and liquefied natural gas (LNG), as of July 29, 2021.
